data.title: Shekhar Suman Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Shekhar Suman with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Well established in the world of television, having hosted comedy, quiz and talent shows

Hosted the satirical political program Poll Khol for a period of five years

Recorded the music album Kuch Khwaab Aise (2007), a collection of love ballads

Cast his son Adhyayan Suman in the lead role in Heartless (2014), his directorial debut
